wikipedia_page.main: Eric Henry Edward Tovey (3 January 1929 – 9 September 2016), known professionally as Lord Littlebrook, was a British midget wrestler. He enjoyed his greatest success during the 1970s, when he held the NWA World Midget's Championship. He was also part of the Wrestlemania III card in 1987 in front of a record 93,173 fans at the Pontiac Silverdome in Detroit, then the largest professional wrestling attendance in North American history.

response: * Eric Tovey, British midget wrestler professionally known as Lord Littlebrook
*Lord Littlebrook (1929–2016), professional name of the British midget wrestler Eric Tovey
